verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
-TSAROTRA
1
Raha mandia lalan-tsarotra,
Jehovah momba anao.
Koa aza dia resin-tahotra,
Fa Izy momba anao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Jehovah momba anao,
Ka matokia.
Fa Izy tia,
Tsy hahafoy tokoa.
He ! Izy momba anao
(Momba anao)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Raha manjombona ny andr anio,
Jehovah momba anao.
Dia aza kivy fa tadidio
Fa Izy momba anao.
Jehovah momba anao, sns

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fantany izay manjo anao,
Jehovah momba anao.
Hitany ny ranomasonao,
Ka mahereza re.
Jehovah momba anao, sns

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ento aminy izao ny entanao
Jehovah momba anao.
Dia raiso ny fitsaharana
Fa atolony anao.
Jehovah momba anao, sns
